properties.description:
Detects the execution of different Windows based hacktools via their import hash (imphash) even if the files have been renamed
Source URL: https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_hktl_execution_via_imphashes.yml
Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Date Modified: 2023-02-04
Status: experimental
References: Internal Research
False Positives: Legitimate use of one of these tools
properties.query:
_Im_ProcessCreate
